Parameters:

def PyPedal.pyp_demog.age_distribution (   pedobj,
  sex = 1 
)

age_distribution() computes histograms of the age distribution of males and females in the population.

You can also stratify by sex to get individual histograms.

Parameters:
pedobj An instance of a PyPedal NewPedigree object.
sex A flag which determines whether or not to stratify by sex.
Return values:
None@verbatim age_distribution() computes histograms of the age distribution of males and females in the population. You can also stratify by sex to get individual histograms.

def PyPedal.pyp_demog.sex_ratio (   pedobj  ) 

sex_ratio() returns a dictionary containing the proportion of males and females in the population.

Parameters:
pedobj An instance of a PyPedal NewPedigree object.
Return values:
dict A dictionary containing entries for each sex/gender code defined in the global SEX_CODE_MAP.
sex_ratio() returns a dictionary containing the proportion of males and females in
the population.
